title: Dan Neil Returns! (Wall Street Journal's "Rumble Seat")
description:
Dan Neil is a well of knowlede and ridiculous stories, and this show isn't one to miss. He pays the bills writing about cars for the Wall Street Journal. He's also the only person to ever win a Pulitzer Prize for Automotive criticism, and he once co-hosted a TV show on SPEED, with Matt! Topics go ALL over the place: Why 2,000HP electric cars aren't about selling cars, getting scared while riding with Keanu Reeves, Tesla vs Porsche, racing driving licenses, bespoke off-roaders, weird gangster Cadillacs, questionable rocket ships, space travel, and more. 

Read Dan's stuff here. https://www.wsj.com/news/types/rumble-seat

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst

Watch this show!: https://youtu.be/n2ZzQscULWs
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
